A haphhazard collection of some of the books/websites/courses I've found helpful over the years. 




## Cognitive Modeling


[Farrell & Lewandowsky's Computational Modeling of Cognition and Behavior](https://psy-farrell.github.io/computational-modelling/) \

[An Introduction to Bayesian Data Analysis for Cognitive Science](https://vasishth.github.io/bayescogsci/book/)

[Modelling Cognitive Processes](https://yxlin.github.io/) \

[COSMOS workshop](https://cosmos-konstanz.github.io/materials/) \ 

[Randy O'Reily's Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/RandallOReilly/videos) \

[MIT Center For Minds and Machines](https://www.youtube.com/c/MITCBMM/videos) \ 

[CMP Lab Video Series on Mathematical Psychology](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChQucsNNsryDVOoawPZeZBw/videos) \

[Catlearn - Cognitive Modeling package for R](https://github.com/ajwills72/catlearn) \
